display_long_description:
Zen Jigsaw – Reassemble Your Mind in Augmented Reality

Immerse yourself in the world of Zen Jigsaw, a next-generation AR puzzle game that transforms your everyday surroundings—whether you're at home, in the office, or walking down the street—into a peaceful, interactive gaming space. No controllers needed: just your hands, the real world, and the puzzle before you.

Step into beautifully crafted AR environments where time slows down, and your only goal is to complete each stunning puzzle. Experience the gentle click of each piece falling into place as you intuitively guide them with your hands. From serene landscapes to abstract masterpieces and themed collections, every puzzle is a moment of calm in the chaos of daily life.

Let the game’s soothing music, natural ambient sounds, and calming visuals help you unwind, focus, and find balance. Play seated or standing, solo or with friends in cooperative mode. Customize your experience with adjustable difficulty and puzzle size—from a quick, relaxing 50-piece puzzle to an immersive 1000-piece challenge.
Zen Jigsaw is where focus meets freedom, where augmented reality meets inner clarity. Rebuild your peace of mind—one piece at a time

No timers. No pressure. Just you, the pieces, and the meditative flow of focus.
Find your focus. Embrace the quiet. Piece your mind back together with Zen Jigsaw.
